```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


# Analysis of antenatal smoking
```{r}
smokers <- read_csv(here("data_clean/antenatal_smoking.csv")) %>% 
  arrange(year)
```

```{r}
smokers %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year,
      y = ratio) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 2002:2019) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, NA)) +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Percentage of antenatal smokers",
       title = "What proportion of new mothers in Scotland are smokers?",
       subtitle = "Based on self-reported information obtained from mothers at their ante-natal visit") +
  theme_minimal()

```
